@astrantiaroma I *think* it’s he and his brother who visit to raid the bird feeders, but I’ll tag the next one, to avoid confusion. Right now we have a visiting rat. No such bond occurring. 😂
@astrantiaroma Johnny used to sit on the doorstep every day while his mum and dad came and went for food. He had a dodgy wing but made it. Peg has a lovely life :-))
@eddiedoch @AlynSmith @foreigncorr1 https://t.co/oBUUk5rMsK
@The_Grownup :-( I find I can treadmill run without making my epic episode of plantar fasciitis worse but can’t run outdoors without spending 48 hrs wincing afterwards. Bah!
@astrantiaroma @Tighe_er No I did not! The dog is already quite committed to wrecking the gaff, a second destroyer would be a disaster (but imagine them cutely sleeping together!! 🖤)
@The_Grownup Ah fuck. Shame - so cheap! Thx :-)
@astrantiaroma @Tighe_er Tell me about it! I was trying to achieve the same with Johnny the Broken Jackdaw with 100% domesticity in mind and NO it didn’t happen 😭 Little Peg tho.... 🖤

@eddiedoch That’s exactly what we’re doing!! I bet yours looks & feels great 👍🏼

@2wheels2dex It's Ikea, mostly everything in there is. Made to measure worktop as we wanted it to flow into deep sills. It's an oak veneer, not solid. I love it because the 'planks' are wider than standard butcher's block pieces so it's calmer on the eye. https://t.co/lTBQ7EvEhe
@Motherhector Thank you!! Very satisfying now. Doing a wee job every day or so fair adds up :-)) xx
@Jem1358 That pink with plants is TO DIE FOR *faints* ☠️🌵🎆
@GinLalli I love it so much Gin 🖤 😭 😂 xx
@2wheels2dex THANK YOU! Heaps of wee things to do but I don’t mind anymore cause the balance has tipped into rewarding :-))))

@eddiedoch Thank you! Really smitten :-) And delighted that the layout actually works for flow and cooking when we’re all home. I worry equally about form & function. Must think about some tiles, too... 🤔
@Archieislander @GoldFlakePaint @superfifer @onfife So, so good. 🖤👏🏼 Well done Clare. Xxxx
This is wonderful. What a different world you get to see, feel and ponder when you read about it through women’s commentary like this. https://t.co/aFKoHcpDRL

Final (for now) oiling on new worktops today. Dining end will pretty much wait til January for decor/plastering/new drop window but hopefully will get the electrics and plumbing sorted down there (mostly removal) before Xmas. Seven years in and we’re shaping up! ;-) #renovation https://t.co/5JkgxOR2Ng
@sjksanders @LordWoolamaloo @Jeggit @BBCsarahsmith @BBC Fucking hell. The idiocy is astounding.
@BBC didn’t promo this in their Memorial & Rememberance coverage, no doubt. #NX18 #NoPlatform #Fascism

Spending some of today stopping paying UK TV licence - @BBC are again platforming, normalising and funding #fascism. Today, in #Edinburgh, giving Steve Bannon, no less, a platform at #NX18. Any speaker worth their salt should be refusing to platform-share - both days. Pitiful.
@sjksanders @LordWoolamaloo @Jeggit Is Bannon going to be there?!

Stepping into the fray of trying to sell something in a straight forward manner on Gumtree again. Hell mend me and my optimism.
@TheSnashPodcast LOVED Episode 7 with @talatyaqoob - what an absolute treat, both. Well done :-))
@ellen_desmond @lumpinthethroat https://t.co/BiJG0DxA9S
@lumpinthethroat @ellen_desmond There is that ‘best avoided’ convo - so unhelpful. And perhaps often a subterfuge used by folks who just don’t want to admit they’re low on facts & high on hearsay?
@ellen_desmond I know, I’m bloody mortified about it. X
@LaraInTheMiddle @TatMum_Blog @acraftycow @GraziaUK Piers Morgan will love it. Therein lies the clue. 😂
@MarieGardiner @GraziaUK Click-bait shite. 🔥😂💩

@LaraInTheMiddle @TatMum_Blog @acraftycow @GraziaUK I think @GraziaUK just couldn’t be arsed sourcing any proper content but are loving all the clicks. Somewhat contradicts their claim of being for ‘smart’ women, however, and not only because it overtly makes one woman look thick.

RT @Ayishat_Akanbi: Mental health afflictions don’t only make you lonely, vulnerable and sad
They can make you self-centred, aggressive, d…
@TatMum_Blog @acraftycow @GraziaUK Yip! I earn way less. Always have. Would’ve been different if I’d stayed in corporate world I dare say, and delayed kids or stayed childless.

@acraftycow @TatMum_Blog I think this woman is quite rare in having parents who could even consider bailing her out. I paid rent from 16, the moment I had a job. Maybe @GraziaUK are after the landed gentry market? Their story does not represent the young women I know at all....
@MarieGardiner @GraziaUK All I know is she is an outlier - an extremely rare one at that - to most women her age.

@TatMum_Blog @GraziaUK I honestly cannot think of one young woman I know at the moment who isn’t scrambling against the odds to be independent, often exhausting themselves and never wasteful. @GraziaUK chose a bizarre story to tell, in this political climate.
@HanJMWright @GraziaUK Click-shite. 🔥 xx
@TatMum_Blog @GraziaUK I feel so baited 😂. Honestly. This is such an outlier to young women’s experiences it’s ridiculous. Misogynists will lap it up. 👏🏼

Awwww. Well done @graziauk for throwing women under the bus again by perpetuating misogynistic stereotypes thru an entirely unrelatable, uncommon tale. Tabloid values at their worst. https://t.co/XesauKwk32
@josiedeacon @ellen_desmond THANK GODDESS 😂🖤😂
RT @talatyaqoob: A bit of a different take today- was asked to talk about “10 things that changed me” (which I actually found quite tough)…

@kirstofcomms It’s absolutely shocking. My Mum kept me as informed as she could and Irish friends have helped over the years too but honestly, this is CORE to even a basic understanding of current UK & Westminster and it’s just... completely absent (as far as I’ve seen in state schools).
@sarahs_mindtank @josiedeacon @IAmHellsBells ACCCCCCCCCEEEEEEE! He’s so damn clever. 🖤

Completely this. My kids, 16 & 18, both taught nothing in school about Ireland, many of their friends have no clue there’s a republic, FFS. So we’re also failing on relatively recent & local history that should hugely inform upcoming voters’ & workforce choices. https://t.co/Al58hpQ2uh
@zoesqwilliams Cloth Lullaby (still blows me away - exquisite beauty) & Nelson Mandela, Long Walk to Freedom. https://t.co/lH3nbZ4GoD
RT @TheGrantidote: SOOOOO worth a watch. Incredible women who value themselves and other women at EVERY age. We can all be them. 🖤 https://…

@sarahs_mindtank @josiedeacon Wasn’t it brilliant?! Such wise women. I loved their individual tales of arriving at feminism. I looked up the book afterwards on Amazon - one from the publication date available for £2027.... 🖤 Hopefully a reprint soon... 😂
